Package net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider

Klasse EntityManagingWallGUIProvider

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider.WallGUIProvider
net.chaossquad.mclib.advancedgui.provider.EntityManagingWallGUIProvider
public class EntityManagingWallGUIProvider extends WallGUIProvider
A WallGUIProvider which manages its own item frame entities.
